body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Bell Security Solutions. My name is Billy Bell. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Madison Stewart.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Madison. Can you please provide me with your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's the ninth of May, nineteen ninety-three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great. And may I also have your home address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my address is two five zero Maple Street, Apt five, Cityville.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Madison. Is there anything specific you'd like to discuss regarding our security services today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Actually, I'm surprised by the recent breach in security at a Car Dealership and wanted to inquire about enhancing security measures for my own property.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern. We can definitely help with improving security at your property. Thank you for sharing your details and concern, Madison. We appreciate your time.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: If you have any further questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out to us. Have a great day!
